label: 桐壺
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: A residence with a paulownia tree (kiri) in its garden in the far northeast corner of the inner palace compound.  It was assigned to a lower ranking imperial wife.  To reach the Emperor’s residence from it meant walking through areas immediately adjacent to the living quarters of other imperial wives.  Shigeisha or Shigeisa was another, Chinese, name of the same residence.[桐、淑景舎][RK]
